title: Import model
description: Choose a DeepRacer model to upload from your local file system. The selected model must be a virtual model previously exported from the DeepRacer solution. Physical car models cannot be uploaded to the solution.

modelName.label: Model name
modelName.description: The model name can have up to 64 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and hyphens (-). No spaces or underscores (_).

modelDescription.label: Model description - optional
modelDescription.description: The model description can have up to 255 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and hyphens (-). No spaces or underscores (_).

validation.modelNameSpecialCharsAndLength: Model name has one or more non-allowed characters, or is greater than 64 characters in length
validation.modelDescSpecialCharsAndLength: Model description has one or more non-allowed characters, or is greater than 255 characters in length

notifications.uploadModelSuccess: Model upload completed successfully. Redirecting to model details page...
notifications.startModelUpload: Model upload started. Please wait while files are being uploaded...
